duties_responsibilities.duty: Achieve individual and/or team financial, production and relationship results relative to the specific metrics and goals assigned.

Manage performance and personnel functions for a team, ensuring operational soundness while executing on a plan to deliver results that create value for the customer and meet the financial expectations of the bank.
Foster collaborative partnerships that deliver value for customers, prospects and colleagues. Initiate conversation to uncover sales or referral opportunities.

Comply with all regulations, bank policies, procedures and delegated authorities to manage risk related to credit, operational, reputational, regulatory and legal aspects of personal interactions, customer transactions and financial exposures.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor degree with a minimum of 4 years experience in a sales, customer service, lending or financial services role, including supervisory experience.
High school diploma or GED with a minimum of 8 years experience in a sales, customer service, lending or financial services role, including supervisory experience.
